text: (napiye!) Maranattirkup payantu tankal vitukalai vittu ayirakkanakkil veliyeriyavarkalai nir kavanittira? Allah avarkalai irakkumpatik kuri (irakkac ceytu) pinnar avarkalai uyirppittan. Niccayamaka allah manitarkalmitu karunaiyullavan avan. Eninum, manitarkalil perumpalanavarkal nanri celuttuvatu illai
